headline: Polymarket Only Gives a 42.5% Chance of NAIL Getting an Interest Rate Tailwind
summary: If you’re considering NAIL or already own shares, you’re betting on a housing recovery with triple leverage. This ETF uses derivatives and borrowed capital to deliver three times the daily return of the Dow Jones U.S. Select Home Builders Index.
